sn35.125:1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling among the Vajjians at Hatthigama. Then the householder Ugga of Hatthigama approached the Blessed One … and said to him….[n.4] AtAN I 26,2he is declared the foremost of those who attend on the Saṅgha(etadaggaṁ saṅgh’ upādāyakānaṃ); see tooAN IV 22–6.
